ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller

Class UserAccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller.UserAccountController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
public class UserAccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller that handles HTTP requests for UserAccount objects in the TOMi system.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot

      Provides services for maintaining UserAccounts.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        @GetMapping(value="/user_accounts/{id}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UserAccount> getAccount(@PathVariable
                                                                                                              java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                              @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                              UserAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a resource representing the requested UserAccount to the source of a GET request to /accounts/id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier for the UserAccount
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        Resource representing the UserAccount object.

      • getActiveAccounts

public org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UserAccount>> getActiveAccounts(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                       UserAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a collection of all active accounts the source of a GET request to /accounts.
        Parameters:
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        Collection of resources representing all active accounts

      • getAccountsByTeam

        @GetMapping(value="/teams/{teamId}/user_accounts")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UserAccount>> getAccountsByTeam(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long teamId,
                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                      UserAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a collection of all accounts associated with a given team.
        Parameters:
        teamId - unique identifier for the team to be retrieved
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        Collection of resources representing all active accounts on a team

      • createUserAccount

        @PostMapping(value="/user_accounts")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createUserAccount(@RequestBody
                                                                                                          UserAccount newUserAccount,
                                                                                                          @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                          UserAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                                   throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a new UserAccount with the attributes provided in the POST request to /accounts.
        Parameters:
        newUserAccount - a userAccount object with required information.
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        the newly created UserAccount
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - When the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • updateUserAccount

        @PutMapping(value="/user_accounts/{id}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UserAccount> updateUserAccount(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                     java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                                     UserAccount newUserAccount,
                                                                                                                     @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                     UserAuthManager authMan)
        Updates the attributes for a UserAccount with the provided id with the attributes provided in the PUT request to /accounts/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the UserAccount to be updated
        newUserAccount - the updated userAccount
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        the updated userAccount

      • setUserAccountInactive

        @DeleteMapping(value="/user_accounts/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> setUserAccountInactive(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long id)
        Sets the requested userAccount's active attribute false, removing it from the list of active accounts. Responds to the DELETE requests to /accounts/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the userAccount to be set inactive
        Returns:
        a response without any content

      • getTeamLead

        @GetMapping(value="/teams/{teamId}/team_lead")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UserAccount> getTeamLead(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                     java.lang.Long teamId,
                                                                                                                     @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                     UserAuthManager authMan)
        Gets the UserAccount for a Team's leader.
        Parameters:
        teamId - the unique identifier for the Team
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        the team lead's UserAccount

      • getUnassignedUserAccounts

        @GetMapping(value="/teams/unassigned")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UserAccount>> getUnassignedUserAccounts(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                  UserAuthManager authMan)
        Gets UserAccounts that are active but not a part of Team.
        Parameters:
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        List of UserAccounts that are active, but not a part of any team

      • handleExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler(value=UserAccountNotFoundException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleExceptions(java.lang.Exception e)
        Informs the client that an exception has occurred. In order to keep the server inner workings private a generic 400 bad request is used.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that had occurred
        Returns:
        A 400 Bad Request Response

      • handleMinimumAccountExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler(value={MinimumProgramDirectorAccountException.class,MinimumAdminAccountException.class,TeamNotFoundException.class})
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleMinimumAccountExceptions(java.lang.Exception e)
        Informs the client that performing the requested action would result in less than the minimum amount of admin accounts or program director accounts.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that had occurred
        Returns:
        An unprocessableEntity Response
